description: technical drawings of three standing men seen from front, with various body proportions measured; central man has facial features delineated and holds PR arm out at 45 degree angle
marks:
Date and Inscription

see Signed LLQ, printed in black: [(C) 1967 HENRY DREYFUSS &
medium: Black marker over graphite on gray linen
provenance: Henry Dreyfuss Associates, New York, 1955-1996; private collection, St. Paul, 1996-2010; his gift to MIA, 2011.
title: Anthropomorphic Data for 95 Percent of U.S.A. Adult Male Population
